95  inline bool SortingLayer::operator==(const SortingLayer &b) const {
96  return m_order == b.m_order;
97  }
98  inline bool SortingLayer::operator!=(const SortingLayer &b) const {
99  return m_order != b.m_order;
100  }
101  inline bool SortingLayer::operator<(const SortingLayer &b) const {
102  return m_order < b.m_order;
103  }
104  inline bool SortingLayer::operator>(const SortingLayer &b) const {
105  return m_order > b.m_order;
106  }
107  inline bool SortingLayer::operator>=(const SortingLayer &b) const {
108  return m_order >= b.m_order;
109  }
110  inline bool SortingLayer::operator<=(const SortingLayer &b) const {
111  return m_order <= b.m_order;
112  }

131 
135 struct SortingLayers {
136 
137  SortingLayers();
138  ~SortingLayers();
139 
140  SortingLayer* getLayer(const GString& label) const {
141  auto iter = std::find_if(m_layers.begin(), m_layers.end(),
142  [label](const auto& layer) { return layer->getName() == label; });
143  if (iter != m_layers.end()) {
144  return (*iter).get();
145  }
146  else {
147  return nullptr;
148  }
149  }
150 
151  SortingLayer* getLayerFromId(uint32_t id) const {
152  auto iter = std::find_if(m_layers.begin(), m_layers.end(),
153  [id](const auto& layer) {return layer->id() == id; });
154  if (iter == m_layers.end()) {
155  return nullptr;
156  }
157  else {
158  return (*iter).get();
159  }
160  }
161 
162  SortingLayer* addLayer() {
163  static std::atomic<uint32_t> nameCount = 0;
164  GString uniqueName = GString::Format("layer_%d", nameCount.load()).c_str();
165  nameCount.fetch_add(1);
166  m_layers.push_back(std::make_unique<SortingLayer>());
167  m_layers.back()->setName(uniqueName);
168  sort();
169  return m_layers.back().get();
170  }
171  SortingLayer* addLayer(const GString& name, int order) {
172  m_layers.push_back(std::make_unique<SortingLayer>(name, order));
173  sort();
174  return m_layers.back().get();
175  }
176 
178  bool removeLayer(const GString& label, std::function<void(uint32_t)> onRemoval);
179  bool removeLayer(uint32_t layerId, std::function<void(uint32_t)> onRemoval);
180 
182  void sort() {
183  std::sort(m_layers.begin(), m_layers.end(), SortRenderLayers);
184  }
185 
186 
187 
188  std::vector<std::unique_ptr<SortingLayer>> m_layers;
189 
190 protected:
191  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
194 
195  static bool SortRenderLayers(const std::unique_ptr<SortingLayer>& l1,
196  const std::unique_ptr<SortingLayer>& l2) {
197  return *l1 < *l2;
198  }
199 
201 
202 };
203
